flm_IO* flm_IONew ( flm_Monitor *  monitor,

void flm_IOShutdown ( flm_IO *  io)

Close the flm_io object as soon as possible.

All the data to write will be written before closing the underlying file descriptor. You will never receive read notifications anymore.

Parameters:
ioA pointer to a flm_io object.
Returns:
Nothing, this function cannot fail.
void flm_IOClose ( flm_IO *  io)

Close the flm_io object immediatly.

The underlying file descriptor will be closed even if some data are not processed or written yet.

Parameters:
ioA pointer to a flm_IO object.
Returns:
Nothing, this function cannot fail.
